channel.title: Db Backup on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Db Backup on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Create, Download and Delete Db Backup
item.description: Preconditions PrestaShop installed Login with admin BO account Steps Step Description Expected result go to database > sql manager page title contains ‘SQL Manager’ go to db backup page title contains ‘DB Backup’ get number of db backups number of backups = 0 generate new db backup Successful message is displayed number of backups = 1 get name of backup generated and Download it (by clicking on it) File with correct name exist in your download directory delete backup from table (with drop down button) successful message is displayed

item.title: Bulk Delete Db Backups
item.description: Preconditions PrestaShop installed Login with admin BO account Steps Step Description Expected result go to database > sql manager page title contains ‘SQL Manager’ go to db backup page title contains ‘DB Backup’ get number of db backups number of backups = 0 generate new db backup Successful message is displayed number of backups = 1 generate new db backup Successful message is displayed

item.title: Pagination
item.description: Preconditions Etre sur le BO Avoir suffisament de backup pour activer la pagination Steps Tester la pagination Expected result la pagination doit fonctionner correctement

item.title: Backup options
item.description: Preconditions Etre sur le Bo Etre sur la page “Advanced parameters => database => dbbackup” Steps faire un backup et le consulter modifier les options de backup et faire un noveau backup consulter le nouveau backup Expected result les deux backup doivent etre diffÃ©rents en fonction des options
